name: Cubethon (Schmuddelfee)
description:
Cubethon is a simple Cuberunner game, where you need good reflexes and a bit of rythm to succeed.

Use A and D or Left and Right Arrow to move.

Escape to Pause the game.

I made this game with the help of Brackeys YT Tutorial, so definitely check him out!

Please have fun with my game and feel free to critique.

New levels are coming eventually so stay updated!
